verses.verse: And when Rachel <S%H7354><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that she bare <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> no children <S%H7354><s%>, Rachel envied <S%H7065><s%> her sister <S%H269><s%>; and she said <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Give <S%H3051><s%> me children <S%H1121><s%>, or else <S%H369><s%> I die <S%H4191><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Rachel <S%H7354><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Am I in God <S%H430><s%>'s stead <S%H4513><s%>, who hath withheld from thee the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the womb <S%H990><s%>?

And she said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H519><s%>, my maid Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>, go in <S%H935><s%> unto her <S%H3205><s%>; that she may bear upon my knees <S%H1290><s%>, and I also may obtain children by her <S%H1129><s%>.
And she gave <S%H5414><s%> him Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> her handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>: and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went in unto her <S%H935><s%>.
And Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>.

And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> hath judged <S%H1777><s%> me <S%H8085><s%>, and hath also heard my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and hath given <S%H5414><s%> me a son <S%H1121><s%>: therefore called <S%H7121><s%> she his name <S%H8034><s%> Dan <S%H1835><s%>.
And Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H3205><s%>, and bare Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>.

And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, With mighty <S%H430><s%> wrestlings <S%H5319><s%> have I wrestled <S%H6617><s%> with my sister <S%H269><s%>, and have prevailed <S%H3201><s%>: and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>.

When Leah <S%H3812><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had left <S%H5975><s%> off bearing <S%H3205><s%>, she took <S%H3947><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> her handmaid <S%H8198><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.
And Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>.
And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Fortunate <S%H1409><s%>! and <S%H935><s%> she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%>.
And Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>.

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Happy am I <S%H837><s%>! for the daughters <S%H1323><s%> will call me happy <S%H833><s%>: and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Asher <S%H836><s%>.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went in <S%H3212><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them unto his mother <S%H517><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>. Then Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Leah <S%H3812><s%>, Give me <S%H5414><s%>, I pray thee <S%H1121><s%>, of thy son's mandrakes <S%H1736><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H4592><s%>, Is it a small matter that thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> away <S%H3947><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%>? and wouldest thou take away <S%H3947><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> also <S%H7354><s%>? And Rachel said <S%H559><s%>, Therefore he shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with thee to-night <S%H8478><s%> for thy son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes <S%H1736><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the field <S%H7704><s%> in the evening <S%H6153><s%>, and Leah <S%H3812><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said, Thou must come in <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H7936><s%>; for I have surely hired <S%H7936><s%> thee with my son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes <S%H1736><s%>. And he lay <S%H7901><s%> with her that night <S%H3915><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto Leah <S%H3812><s%>, and she conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>.

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> me my hire <S%H7939><s%>, because <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> my handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to my husband <S%H376><s%>: and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Issachar <S%H3485><s%>.
And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H3205><s%>, and bare a sixth <S%H8345><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> hath endowed <S%H2064><s%> me with a good <S%H2896><s%> dowry <S%H2065><s%>; now <S%H6471><s%> will my husband <S%H376><s%> dwell <S%H2082><s%> with me <S%H3205><s%>, because I have borne him six <S%H8337><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>: and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>.
And afterwards <S%H310><s%> she bare <S%H3205><s%> a daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and God <S%H430><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to her <S%H6605><s%>, and opened her womb <S%H7358><s%>.
And she conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>: and said <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> hath taken away <S%H622><s%> my reproach <S%H2781><s%>:
and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> add <S%H3254><s%> to me another <S%H312><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7354><s%>, when Rachel had borne <S%H3205><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Laban <S%H3837><s%>, Send me away <S%H7971><s%>, that I may go <S%H3212><s%> unto mine own place <S%H4725><s%>, and to my country <S%H776><s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> me my wives <S%H802><s%> and my children <S%H3206><s%> for <S%H2004><s%> whom I have served <S%H5647><s%> thee <S%H3212><s%>, and let me go: for thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> my service <S%H5656><s%> wherewith I have served thee <S%H5647><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H4672><s%>, If now I have found favor <S%H2580><s%> in thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, tarry <S%H5172><s%>: for I have divined that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> me for thy sake <S%H1558><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Appoint <S%H5344><s%> me thy wages <S%H7939><s%>, and I will give it <S%H5414><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3045><s%>, Thou knowest how <S%H834><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> thee <S%H834><s%>, and how thy cattle have fared with me <S%H4735><s%>.

For it was little <S%H4592><s%> which thou hadst before I <S%H6440><s%> came <S%H6555><s%>, and it hath increased unto a multitude <S%H7230><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee whithersoever I turned <S%H7272><s%>: and now when <S%H4970><s%> shall I provide <S%H6213><s%> for mine own house also <S%H1004><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, What shall I give thee <S%H5414><s%>? And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Thou shalt not give <S%H5414><s%> me aught <S%H3972><s%>: if thou wilt do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> for me <S%H7725><s%>, I will again feed <S%H7462><s%> thy flock <S%H6629><s%> and keep it <S%H8104><s%>.

I will pass <S%H5674><s%> through all thy flock <S%H6629><s%> to-day <S%H3117><s%>, removing <S%H5493><s%> from thence every speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> one <S%H7716><s%>, and every black <S%H2345><s%> one <S%H7716><s%> among the sheep <S%H3775><s%>, and the spotted <S%H2921><s%> and speckled <S%H5348><s%> among the goats <S%H5795><s%>: and of such shall be my hire <S%H7939><s%>.

So shall my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> for me hereafter <S%H3117><s%>, when <S%H4279><s%> thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> concerning my hire <S%H7939><s%> that is before thee <S%H6440><s%>: every one <S%H3605><s%> that is not speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> among the goats <S%H5795><s%>, and black <S%H2345><s%> among the sheep <S%H3775><s%>, that <S%H1589><s%>, if found with me, shall be counted stolen.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3863><s%>, I would it might be according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>.

And he removed <S%H5493><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> the he-goats <S%H8495><s%> that were ringstreaked <S%H6124><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%>, and all the she-goats <S%H5795><s%> that were speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%>, every one that had white <S%H3836><s%> in it <S%H2345><s%>, and all the black ones among the sheep <S%H3775><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>;

and he set <S%H7760><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> betwixt himself and Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%>'s flocks <S%H6629><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him rods <S%H4731><s%> of fresh <S%H3892><s%> poplar <S%H3839><s%>, and of the almond <S%H3869><s%> and of the plane-tree <S%H6196><s%>; and peeled <S%H6478><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> streaks <S%H6479><s%> in them <S%H3836><s%>, and made the white appear <S%H4286><s%> which was in the rods <S%H4731><s%>.

And he set <S%H3322><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> which he had peeled <S%H6478><s%> over <S%H5227><s%> against the flocks <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters <S%H7298><s%> in the watering-troughs <S%H4325><s%> where <S%H8268><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>; and they conceived <S%H3179><s%> when they came <S%H935><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.

And the flocks <S%H6629><s%> conceived <S%H3179><s%> before the rods <S%H4731><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> brought forth <S%H3205><s%> ringstreaked <S%H6124><s%>, speckled <S%H5348><s%>, and spotted <S%H2921><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> separated <S%H6504><s%> the lambs <S%H3775><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the flocks <S%H6629><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the ringstreaked <S%H6124><s%> and all the black <S%H2345><s%> in the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%>: and he put <S%H7896><s%> his own droves <S%H5739><s%> apart <S%H7896><s%>, and put them not unto Laban <S%H3837><s%>'s flock <S%H6629><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7194><s%>, whensoever the stronger of the flock <S%H6629><s%> did conceive <S%H3179><s%>, that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> laid <S%H7760><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> before the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters <S%H7298><s%>, that they might conceive <S%H3179><s%> among the rods <S%H4731><s%>;

but when the flock <S%H6629><s%> were feeble <S%H5848><s%>, he put them not in <S%H7760><s%>: so the feebler <S%H5848><s%> were Laban <S%H3837><s%>'s, and the stronger <S%H7194><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s.

And the man <S%H376><s%> increased <S%H6555><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%>, and had large <S%H7227><s%> flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and maid-servants <S%H8198><s%> and men-servants <S%H5650><s%>, and camels <S%H1581><s%> and asses <S%H2543><s%>.
